attributes.action: Facilitate communities to sue police forces for neglect caused by perverse proiritisation of resources.
attributes.additional_details:
Communities subjected to levels of criminal damage and insecurity that misdirected resources should have abated, must be enabled to seek proper accountability and compensation (less wishy-washy excuses, apologies, politicking & dubiously merited resignations).

A clear significant case where this would have been apt is 09/08/11, when thousand of officers were diverted from English towns to a quite peaceful London. In the proceeding riots, some areas suffered with fewer officers when they needed them most.

Any district should be represented as a plaintiff, able to fund action by any means of collection, and compensation should be protected in a special community fund (a la 'The Big Society' / 'Localism') for development & investment.
